body:
Hey guys! I'm going to try this game out and see if you guys can guess which nebula map I am talking about. (ITS VERY EASY)Here it goes
 
CLUE 1. The 2 teams are Red and Blue
CLUE 2. It is quite a popular map
CLUE 3. There are 2 monuments on each team 
CLUE 4. It is not a map where you have to build over, it's a biome :D

The rules: 
- I'll be checking the comments and the first person to guess it right can choose another map and give some clues!
- Make sure to reply to that person and not just to comment.
- Be free to make one of your one too

GL HF :)
